title: Better Villages Mod 怎么安装

replies.author: Lucky777777
replies.txt_content:
Lucky777777 发表于 2014-4-11 15:41
编辑中

  .下载mod
  .把文件中所有.class文件拖入.jar中
  .*.直接将BetterVillages.cfg拖入.minecraft文件夹中
.记得同样方式安装singleAI
.完成

replies.author: Lucky777777
replies.txt_content:
编辑中

Mod Spotlight:How to install Better Villages Mod:*.Download and installMinecraft Forge
*.Download zip file
*.Drag the every single class file inside your minecraft.jar
*.Drag BetterVillages.cfg into the .minecraft directory
*.Remember to put singleAI into minecraft.jar as well
*.Done
